articles.content: Google is developing artificial intelligence-enabled tools to help journalists research and write news articles, a development that is likely to rattle nerves across the media industry after years of… [+2011 chars]

articles.author: Kyle Bradshaw
articles.title: Google Assistant can soon 'Summarize' webpages [Gallery] - 9to5Google
articles.description: One of the most straightforward features of generative AI tools is the ability to take long pieces of text and...
articles.content: One of the most straightforward features of generative AI tools is the ability to take long pieces of text and summarize them into a few short bullet points. Soon, you’ll be able to use Google Assist… [+2678 chars]
